title: Liverpool City of Culture Advert - Slab serif?
content:
Hi. I’m kicking myself over this, but anyone know what this typeface is? They’ve used a few different weights in the advert.

Any help, greatly appreciated!  
cheers

Terry

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122024625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/liverpool_3542.jpg)

 [‹ Type ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122024625/http:/typophile.com/node/40924 "Go to previous forum topic") [May 1972, New York City font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080122024625/http:/typophile.com/node/41133 "Go to next forum topic")
author: terryscruby
